name: updateDefaultScreenScheme
description:
Updates the default screen scheme of an issue type screen scheme. The default screen scheme is used for all unmapped issue types.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

issueTypeScreenSchemeId.description: The ID of the issue type screen scheme.

UpdateDefaultScreenScheme.description: The ID of a screen scheme.

screenSchemeId.description: The ID of the screen scheme.
